text: Tomer Ben Haim (; born 2 January 1988) is an Israeli footballer who plays as a Midfielder. He was play also for Maccabi Ironi Ashdod. ==Honours as a player == * Hapoel Marmorek **Toto Cup For the third league: 2008–09 *Maccabi Ironi Ashdod **Liga Bet: 2018–19 ==External links== * Tomer Ben Haim, At the Israel Football Association site (He) * Tomer Ben Haim, At the Hapoel Petah Tikva Museum (He) * Not stopping: Tomer Ben Haim signed with Maccabi Ironi Ashdod, At the doublepass site (He) ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Israeli Jews Category:Living people Category:Jewish footballers Category:Israeli footballers Category:Gadna Tel Aviv Yehuda F.C. players Category:Hapoel Marmorek F.C. players Category:Hapoel Petah Tikva F.C. players Category:Sektzia Nes Tziona F.C. players Category:Hapoel Nir Ramat HaSharon F.C. players Category:Maccabi Yavne F.C. players Category:F.C.
